Previous Next Send How do you feel? • Don't forget to take your test. • Take 2 pills at 12:00 Messages Welcome Evaluation
Are you sure?
Please fill in all fields Invalid email format Password cannot be empty No internet connection Login issues Your device is out of storage An unknown local error occurred The request timed out Too many requests sent. Please try again later A server error occurred There was a problem processing the server response An unknown server error occurred An unexpected error occurred
Logged in successfully Sent successfully Measurements Password Email Clock Test Activities Graphs Medications Document Share Chat Memory HitBer Pass
//Medications Select a date
S M T W T F S Report Medication taken I took %1$s on:\nDate: %2$s\nTime: %3$s Save Date Time - Select Date Select Time search...
Report medication Set medication alarm Daily Weekly Start date cannot be empty End date cannot be earlier than start date Back When do you want to get notification How many times per day Select week days Start time What date you want the notification will work? Start date End date Leave empty to not set end date
Exit Continue Start
HITBER Note • The task takes about 20 minutes. • The task must be completed continuously, without any breaks. • Please read the instructions all the way through. • All tasks must be completed. • To hear the instructions, click on "Listen". • It is recommended to complete the tasks in a quiet room. • The instructions are written in masculine form but refer to all genders. Good luck!
Time and place Choose the correct answer. To select it, tap on the question Drop down drop up Icon
What day is it today? Sunday Monday Tuesday Wednesday Thursday Friday Saturday
What month are we in? January February March April May June July August September October November December
What year are we in? 1994 2024 1964 2025 2000 2023 1924 1948
Which city are you currently in? Ganei Tikva Haifa Tel Aviv Petah Tikva Rishon Lezion Kfar Saba Rosh Haayin Bnei Brak Jerusalem Beer Sheva
In which country do you live? Morocco United States Iraq Lebanon Israel Yemen Russia Ethiopia
In which region of Israel are you? Center North South Western Galilee Northern Sharon Coastal Plain
Why are you answering this questionnaire? I don't know Because I am testing my cognitive abilities I was told to come It's a routine activity for me
Shapes Task You are shown 5 shapes. Try to remember them for the upcoming task. When you're ready, press Continue. Select 5 Shapes You are presented with several shapes. Please select the 5 shapes you saw a few minutes ago by clicking on them. If you don't remember, feel free to guess. When finished, press Continue. Please select the 5 shapes you saw a few questions ago. profile icon I understand Ellipse Rectangle Pentagon Star Hashtag Rhombus Cone Plus Hexagon Right Triangle Asterisk Check Trapezoid Triangle Close
Concentration In the next minute, numbers will appear in the center of the screen. Each time you see the number 7, you should tap the screen. To start the task, click Start. At the end of the task, the message "Thank you" will appear. Click Continue. Thank you, please proceed to the next question
Naming Write what is shown in the image. To write your answer, click on the question. When finished, click continue. What is in the picture? Image1 Image2 Pencil Ruler Table Ball Balloon Lemon
Instructions Understanding In this part, you will be asked to perform a task. To listen to the task, press the listen button. When finished, press continue. Volume Icon Listen Open the fridge Close the fridge Table Item Napkin Speaker https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/minimental-hit.appspot.com/o/Three%20Phase%20Instruction%20Versions%2FMyRec_0526_1313%D7%94%D7%95%D7%A8%D7%90%D7%94%20%D7%AA%D7%9C%D7%AA%20%D7%A9%D7%9C%D7%91%D7%99%D7%AA.mp3?alt=media&token=3c76d7dc-b264-4bdb-83fe-4ce16eaa5e44 https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/minimental-hit.appspot.com/o/Three%20Phase%20Instruction%20Versions%2FMyRec_0526_1328%D7%92%D7%A8%D7%A1%D7%94%20%D7%A9%D7%A0%D7%99%D7%94%20%D7%94%D7%95%D7%A8%D7%90%D7%94%20%D7%AA%D7%9C%D7%AA%20%D7%A9%D7%9C%D7%91%D7%99%D7%AA.mp3?alt=media&token=24ba10bd-e6e6-415b-9397-0317c4c0cc3e https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/minimental-hit.appspot.com/o/Three%20Phase%20Instruction%20Versions%2FMyRec_0526_1330%D7%92%D7%A8%D7%A1%D7%94%20%D7%A9%D7%9C%D7%99%D7%A9%D7%99%D7%AA%20%D7%94%D7%95%D7%A8%D7%90%D7%AA%20%D7%AA%D7%9C%D7%AA%20%D7%A9%D7%9C%D7%91%D7%99%D7%AA.mp3?alt=media&token=d5204567-d417-41b1-80f5-8739ef2e0cf8 https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/minimental-hit.appspot.com/o/Three%20Phase%20Instruction%20Versions%2FMyRec_0526_1331%D7%92%D7%A8%D7%A1%D7%94%20%D7%A8%D7%91%D7%99%D7%A2%D7%99%D7%AA%20%D7%94%D7%95%D7%A8%D7%90%D7%94%20%D7%AA%D7%9C%D7%AA%20%D7%A9%D7%9C%D7%91%D7%99%D7%AA.mp3?alt=media&token=e706eeb4-647c-4910-8a24-6b1dc3eba139
Drag and drop Drag the green circle into the square, then press Continue. Drag the yellow circle into the square, then press Continue. Drag the black circle into the square, then press Continue. Drag the blue circle into the square, then press Continue.
Drag the green circle into the square, then press Continue. Drag the yellow circle into the square, then press Continue. Drag the black circle into the square, then press Continue. Drag the blue circle into the square, then press Continue.
Writing In this part, you need to assemble a sentence from the words displayed in front of you. To place a word in the sentence, drag it to the slot you choose. If you want to change the position of a word already placed, you need to drag it again from the word pool and place it in the new slot. Once finished, click continue. Close Icon yesterday I had dinner with grandma Yesterday I had dinner with grandma Yesterday I had dinner with grandma I had dinner with grandma yesterday I had dinner with grandma yesterday
Build Shape You need to replicate the image displayed on the left to the center of the screen. You should use the shapes shown on the right to recreate the image. Drag and arrange the shapes in the center of the screen. Once finished, click continue. The shape model to build The shapes available to you Shape Image
Summary You have completed the test. Please contact your therapist for further details.
Building the daily schedule Building the continuation of the daily schedule You need to enter the meetings into the schedule according to the instructions. Tapping on a meeting will show the time. All activities must be placed in the calendar before continuing
Sunday Monday Tuesday Wednesday Thursday
09:00 10:00 11:00 12:00 13:00 14:00 15:00 16:00
Book Dumbbell Move Lecture Coffee Doctor
Take the grandchildren to a story hour at the library on Wednesday at 16:00 Exercise class at the community center on Sundays at 11:00 for one hour Go for a morning walk twice a week for at least one hour Attend a lecture on Thursday at 15:00 for one hour Social meeting at the cafe on Tuesdays at 11:00 for two hours Eye doctor appointment before Tuesday between 09:00–12:00 for one hour
Incoming Call Incoming Call Beit Rivka 052-538-1648 Thank you The task is completed, thank you very much for your cooperation
Memory Test The task takes about 20 minutes Instructions You must complete the task without interruptions Read the instructions to the end All tasks must be completed To hear the instructions, press Listen It is recommended to perform the task in a quiet room Good luck! To start the task, press Start
Room Screen Bedroom Living Room Kitchen Drag and place the seven objects in the three rooms as you would place them in your home. You must remember the location of the objects. When finished, press Continue.
I will remember everything Talk to the family Use the diary What will you do? Here is a schedule of activities. What should you do to remember all the listed activities? Rate your feelings How well do you think you will do in the upcoming task? Rate
Delete Continue Start

052–538–1648
Thank you very much for your cooperation FMPT Functional Mobile Phone Test
Dentist: 052–258–1194 Family Doctor: 054–228–6972 Paint Clinic: 050–333–1528 dermatologist: 052–260–1048 Orthopedist: 053–128–8891 Neurologist: 050–001–6390 Ophthalmologist: 052–246–7628 Psychiatrist: 054–187–2399
Device Apps app The app you enter is:
Hello, the occupational therapist would like to assess your functional ability in using a phone. In the next few minutes, two tasks related to phone usage will appear on the tablet, which serves as the phone. Follow the instructions. Let's begin.
First task: call Hana Cohen. You have completed the first task; here is another one. A list of phone numbers is displayed, please call the dental clinic.
What do you need to do now? Dialer opened
Look for the contacts list on the phone The back button is located at the top left of the screen Returning to the apps screen
Which contact are you looking for? Search for Hannah Cohen in the contacts Search under the letter H
Press on the number itself or the dial button. The first mission is complete, we will move to the next mission shortly
Look for the dental clinics phone number Dial the dental clinics number Press the dialer button shown on the left side of the screen.
You dialed the wrong number, please dial the dental clinics number The phone number of the dental clinic is displayed. Please call the clinic
Here is Hannah Cohens number, please call her Based on PASS Test
Calculator Settings Camera Store Clock Contacts Wallet Weather My Files Phone video Whatsapp
Contact Contact details Dial keys
0522581194 Dialer Delete number Dial
Welcome! End
